caption.p: Flowchart for patients with myeloma at Karolinska University Hospital. Day 0: admission, chemotherapy conditioning, oral mucosal cooling along with completion of quality of life (QoL) questionnaire (FACT-G) and evaluation of cooling method. Day 1: autologous stem cell transplantation (ASCT). Follow-up (green box) and perception of oral problems using a diary begins at admission and continues until discharge or day +28. QoL (FACT-G) is evaluated again at discharge. CRP, C reactive protein; NRS, Numeric Pain Rating Scale; OM, oral mucositis; OMAS, Oral Mucositis Assessment Scale; WBC, white blood cell.
